recipe.title: Watermelon Salad
ingredients: 1 1/2 tablespoons light rum, or to taste
instructions: Remove rind and any seeds from watermelon and cut fruit into 1-inch pieces. Into a bowl finely grate zest from lime and squeeze enough juice to measure 2 teaspoons. Stir in watermelon, cilantro, and rum and toss to combine. Chill watermelon salad 15 minutes.
